short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Hakka Shopify chrome extension lets you quickly create orders from anywhere.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Hakka saves you time with creating orders by turning the Shopify admin into a chrome extension, so you don't need to waste any finding your way around a new platform. 

Create orders on the fly just by opening up our chrome extension, and stop wasting time jumping back and forth between your email / DMs and Shopify all day. 

Download Hakka today to quickly create orders from anywhere and stop switching between dozens of tabs to get your work done!
